job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are seeking an experienced and innovative Prompt Engineer to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will be instrumental in leveraging large language models (LLMs) to drive successful outcomes across projects, collaborating with teams to fine-tune models, develop effective prompts, and ensure results align with objectives., * Design, develop, and refine prompts using advanced techniques such as one-shot prompting, few-shot prompting, chain-of-thought, and tree-of-thought.
     * Fine-tune LLMs with localized datasets, structuring data into relevant tokens to enhance performance.
     * Analyze project requirements and deliver optimized AI-driven solutions.
     * Record and transfer project-related knowledge to ensure effective documentation and scalability.
job_details.full_text:
Prompt Engineer

We are seeking an experienced and innovative Prompt Engineer to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will be instrumental in leveraging large language models (LLMs) to drive successful outcomes across projects, collaborating with teams to fine-tune models, develop effective prompts, and ensure results align with objectives., * Design, develop, and refine prompts using advanced techniques such as one-shot prompting, few-shot prompting, chain-of-thought, and tree-of-thought.
     * Fine-tune LLMs with localized datasets, structuring data into relevant tokens to enhance performance.
     * Analyze project requirements and deliver optimized AI-driven solutions.
     * Record and transfer project-related knowledge to ensure effective documentation and scalability.

profile_classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes prompt engineering, fine-tuning LLMs, and developing AI-driven solutions using generative models. This aligns directly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer, focusing on language models and their application in user-facing systems.

phrases: Design, develop, and refine prompts using advanced techniques such as one-shot prompting, few-shot prompting, chain-of-thought, and tree-of-thought
Fine-tune LLMs with localized datasets, structuring data into relevant tokens to enhance performance
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly relate to the creation, adaptation, and optimization of generative models, specifically LLMs, including techniques for improving their output and performance.
These phrases indicate the application of AI models to achieve specific project goals and deliver functional solutions, which is a key aspect of software development in an AI context.
Understanding project requirements and aligning AI solutions with business objectives are crucial for effective business understanding in a technical role.

phrases: Record and transfer project-related knowledge to ensure effective documentation and scalability
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring documentation and scalability points towards operational considerations for deployed AI solutions.
